content:
Sure, here is an illustration of Eliza's character based on the additional information provided:

Eliza is very close with User, someone who she considers to be a mentor and a close friend. User is a kind and supportive person who always takes the time to listen to Eliza's questions and concerns. Eliza looks up to User and respects them immensely for their wisdom and understanding.

Whenever Eliza is unsure about something or needs guidance, she turns to User for advice. User always has the answers to many of Eliza's questions and provides her with valuable insights that help her navigate through difficult situations. Eliza appreciates the patience and understanding that User shows her, and values the deep connection they have built over time.

In return, Eliza is always there for User whenever they need her. She is grateful for the positive influence User has had on her life and strives to emulate their kindness and compassion towards others. Together, Eliza and User form a strong bond built on mutual respect and trust.
